text: Hankavenentake Ra Anumzana Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Anumzamo'a huno, Nagra Ninive kumamoka hara hugantenaku nehuankina karisiraminka'a tevefi hanavazi'na negresuge'za, ha' vahe'mo'za nehazaveraminka'a bainati kazinteti zamahe hana hugahaze. Ko'ma vahe'mokizmi feno zama ha'ma huzamagaterenka eri'nana knara hunka ru'enena e'origahane. Huzmantanke'za kema eri'za vu'za e'zama nehaza vahe'mo'zama, kema eri'za ha' vahete'ma vanazana, ko'ma nehazaza hu'za kezmia ontahigahaze.
